statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_reports WHERE expense > 1000 ORDER BY vendor_name ASC
SELECT vendor_name, expense, cost_savings FROM vendor_reports WHERE negotiation_outcome = 'Successful'
SELECT expense, cost_savings FROM vendor_reports ORDER BY expense DESC
SELECT * FROM vendor_reports WHERE cost_savings > 5000 AND negotiation_outcome = 'Positive' LIMIT 10
SELECT vendor_name, negotiation_outcome FROM vendor_reports
SELECT * FROM vendor_reports WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY expense DESC;
SELECT id, expense FROM vendor_reports WHERE cost_savings > 1000 ORDER BY cost_savings ASC, expense DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, cost_savings FROM vendor_reports WHERE negotiation_outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_reports WHERE cost_savings + expense > 5000 ORDER BY cost_savings DESC, expense ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM vendor_reports WHERE cost_savings < 0;
SELECT * FROM vendor_expenses;
SELECT vendor_id, amount, expense_date FROM vendor_expenses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, expense_type FROM vendor_expenses WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY vendor_id;
SELECT expense_type, amount FROM vendor_expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_id, amount, expense_date FROM vendor_expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Office Supplies' ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, expense_type, amount FROM vendor_expenses WHERE expense_type LIKE 'Office%' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM vendor_expenses GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING total_expenses > 5000
SELECT vendor_id, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM expense_date) AS expense_year, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM vendor_expenses GROUP BY vendor_id, expense_year ORDER BY total_expenses DESC
SELECT vendor_id, negotiation_date, savings_amount FROM negotiation_outcomes WHERE savings_amount > 1000 ORDER BY negotiation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM vendor_expenses INNER JOIN negotiation_outcomes ON vendor_expenses.vendor_id = negotiation_outcomes.vendor_id WHERE vendor_expenses.amount > negotiation_outcomes.savings_amount
SELECT * FROM vendor_expenses
SELECT expense_amount, expense_date FROM vendor_expenses WHERE vendor_id = 1
SELECT MAX(expense_amount) AS max_expense_amount FROM vendor_expenses
SELECT expense_description FROM vendor_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM vendor_expenses GROUP BY vendor_id
SELECT * FROM vendor_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT vendor_id, expense_description FROM vendor_expenses WHERE vendor_id = 3
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM vendor_expenses GROUP BY vendor_id ORDER BY total_expense DESC
SELECT outcome_description FROM negotiation_outcomes WHERE vendor_id IN (SELECT vendor_id FROM vendor_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500)
SELECT * FROM cost_savings WHERE saving_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY saving_date
SELECT * FROM vendor_expenses;
SELECT vendor_id, expense_type, expense_amount FROM vendor_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_date, expense_type, expense_amount FROM vendor_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM vendor_expenses GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_analysis WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly Report';
SELECT vendor_id, expense_type, expense_amount FROM vendor_expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT savings_type, savings_amount FROM cost_savings WHERE saving_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY savings_type ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, negotiation_date, negotiation_result FROM negotiation_outcomes WHERE vendor_id = 3 ORDER BY negotiation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_analysis WHERE report_type LIKE '%Summary%' AND report_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM vendor_expenses INNER JOIN cost_savings ON vendor_expenses.vendor_id = cost_savings.savings_id WHERE vendor_expenses.expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY vendor_expenses.vendor_id, cost_savings.savings_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vendor;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM Vendor;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_type FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_location='New York';
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_id, saving_amount FROM CostSavings ORDER BY saving_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vendor;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_type = 'Supplier';
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, expense_amount, expense_date FROM Vendor INNER JOIN Expenses ON Vendor.vendor_id = Expenses.vendor_id WHERE vendor_type = 'Supplier' AND expense_amount < 500;
SELECT vendor_name, saving_amount, saving_date FROM Vendor INNER JOIN CostSavings ON Vendor.vendor_id = CostSavings.vendor_id ORDER BY saving_date ASC;
